name: Ashe
title: the Frost Archer
shortBio: Iceborn warmother of the Avarosan tribe, Ashe commands the most populous horde in the north. Stoic, intelligent, and idealistic, yet uncomfortable with her role as leader, she taps into the ancestral magics of her lineage to wield a bow of True Ice. With her people's belief that she is the mythological hero Avarosa reincarnated, Ashe hopes to unify the Freljord once more by retaking their ancient, tribal lands.

skins.name: Freljord Ashe
skins.description: Under a united Freljord, Ashe leads her kinsfolk under one banner to protect against all invaders and the impending threat from the Watchers. With her fellow clan leaders by her side, there's no force in all of Runeterra that can threaten the North.

skins.name: Sherwood Forest Ashe
skins.description: Condemned as a rogue and a thief, Ashe is nonetheless a leader of the free peoples of Albion, protecting the weak and the powerless from oppression in any form. Hundreds of bounty hunters have scoured the woods to find her, but they always come back with empty handsâ€¦ and emptier pockets.

skins.name: Woad Ashe
skins.description: A legendary wilderness archer, Ashe is the first and last member of the Woad Tribe many a wayward traveler will ever meet. Nothing is known of her past, save for frozen corpses littering the northern trails.

skins.name: Queen Ashe
skins.description: A radiant queen once venerated as a figure reborn from legend, Ashe rules her people as the visionary leader of two great Freljordian houses. Yet two equally driven rivals oppose her queendom, as a rising darkness threatens to consume them all.

skins.name: Heartseeker Ashe
skins.description: Leader of the Heartseekers and self-described queen of hearts, Ashe is a just ruler with no tolerance for agony or grief as the season of romance approaches. Instead she'd rather fill the world with love... generally using projectile weapons.

skins.name: Marauder Ashe
skins.description: Magelord culture was, at the height of the empire's power, strictly segregated into brutal warrior-castes, whose rise and fall was dictated by their victories in battle. Little regard is paid to this outdated militarism nowâ€”Marauder captains like Ashe maintain power simply by instilling fear, and slaying their rivals.

skins.name: PROJECT: Ashe
skins.description: While on the frontlines of a corporate war, Ashe witnessed the human cost of PROJECT's ambition. Now the leader of the resistance group G/NETIC, Ashe has set her sights on nothing less than the downfall of the most powerful corporations.

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a Loot exclusive during a Worlds event.

skins.name: Cosmic Queen Ashe

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive during 2018.

skins.description: Benevolent ruler of the stars, Ashe fires her arrows across the endless darkness of space, creating new constellations wherever they fall. Her court drifts between galaxies, replenishing all the lights that have faded.

skins.name: High Noon Ashe

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2019.
This chroma was released as a Loot exclusive in 2019.

skins.description: A mechanical angel built at the dawn of the pioneer age, Ashe is fueled by the blood of deities gunned down in the infamous land rush that destroyed Heaven. She has adopted a devil-may-care attitude as she seeks adventure, choosing to forgive and protect the same mankind that forever robbed itself of eternal paradise.

skins.name: Fae Dragon Ashe

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2020.
This chroma was released as a Loot exclusive in the 2020 Worlds event.
This chroma was released as a Loot exclusive in the Worlds 2021 event.

skins.description: Ashe led her tribe into a mysterious forest to protect them from Brand's destruction. There, she happened upon the Fae Dragon, who sensed her immense power and devotion to her people and blessed her with its arcane magic. Now, Ashe weaves spells to keep them safe while biding her time for her revenge.

skins.name: Coven Ashe

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2021.
This chroma was released as a Loot exclusive in the 2021 Coven event.

skins.description: They came to Ashe in a bone-deep chillâ€”the frost of the Jet-Black Ibex, entombing the world in ice. She descended the mountain and brought a harrowing winter with herâ€¦ but that is not the only thing that followed Ashe into the night. The mountain itself rumbles.

skins.name: Ocean Song Ashe

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2022.

skins.description: As the CEO of the hot clothing company Frel, Ashe is dead tired after spending a year heads-down in work with little sun at her Northern headquarters. The Ocean Song Festival sounds like the perfect place for her to warm up, disappear into a crowd, and lose herself to some fabulous music.

skins.name: Lunar Empress Ashe

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2023.
This chroma was released as a Loot exclusive in the 2023 Lunar Revel event.

skins.description: Her people slaughtered, Asheâ€”daughter of the Emperor of the Great Seaâ€”sought solace on an abandoned island far from home. There, she made alliances with a strange serpent and a sinister would-be king, in the hope that their untapped might could help seize her empire back. It was a hard-fought victory, but the true battle is far from over: diplomacy.

skins.name: DRX Ashe

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive during DRX World Championship showcase.

skins.description: Honoring BeryL's winning performance as Ashe during the 2022 World Championship.

skins.name: Crystalis Motus Ashe
skins.description: Ashe's retreat from her northern homeland was not due to any invasion, but the Prismae Crystals. In such a harsh environment, their power was difficult to resist, leading many to lose their minds and bodies to its magic. Forced to find shelter in the south, Ashe now gathers an army to take back her home from the monsters that overrun it.

skins.name: Infernal Ashe

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2024.

skins.description: Using her accursed bow, Ashe sets her sights on all who have not already willingly joined the Ashen Lord's army. Once pierced by her blazing arrows, her mark immediately becomes consumed by the Infernal flame and damned to serve within his legions forevermore.

passive.name: Frost Shot
passive.description:
Ashe's attacks slow their target, causing her to deal increased damage to these targets.

Ashe's critical strikes deal no bonus damage but apply an empowered slow to the target.

spells.name: Ranger's Focus
spells.description: Ashe builds up Focus by attacking. At maximum Focus, Ashe can cast Ranger's Focus to consume all stacks of Focus, temporarily increasing her Attack Speed and transforming her basic attack into a powerful flurry attack for the duration.
spells.dynamicDescription:
Passive: Ashe's Attacks grant a stack for @Effect1Amount@ seconds. At @Effect2Amount@ stacks, she may activate this Ability.

Active: Ashe gains @Effect4Amount@% Attack Speed and her Attacks deal @EmpoweredDamage@ damage instead for @Effect3Amount@ seconds.@SpellModifierDescriptionAppend@

spells.name: Volley
spells.description: Ashe fires arrows in a cone for increased damage. Also applies Frost Shot.
spells.dynamicDescription: Ashe fires a volley of @NumberOfArrowsTooltip@ arrows, each dealing <physicalDamage>@TotalDamage@ physical damage</physicalDamage>. Enemies can be hit by multiple arrows, but only take damage from the first.@SpellModifierDescriptionAppend@

spells.name: Hawkshot
spells.description: Ashe sends her Hawk Spirit on a scouting mission anywhere on the map.
spells.dynamicDescription:
Ashe sends forth a hawk to grant vision for 5 seconds anywhere on the map. It also reveals the area around it as it flies.

This Ability has 2 charges (@ChargeCooldown@ second recharge).@SpellModifierDescriptionAppend@

spells.name: Enchanted Crystal Arrow
spells.description: Ashe fires a missile of ice in a straight line. If the arrow collides with an enemy Champion, it deals damage and stuns the Champion, stunning for longer the farther arrow has traveled. In addition, surrounding enemy units take damage and are slowed.
spells.dynamicDescription: Ashe launches a crystal arrow of ice that <status>Stuns</status> the first champion hit and deals <magicDamage>@RMainDamage@ magic damage</magicDamage>. The <status>Stun</status> duration increases with distance travelled, up to @MaxStunDuration@ seconds. Surrounding enemies are <status>Slowed</status> by <spellName>Frost Shot</spellName>.@SpellModifierDescriptionAppend@
